entries.title: Facebook and Instagram will reinstate Trump after two-year ban
entries.description: The decision comes two years after Trump's suspension on Facebook was enacted following the 2021 insurrection at the U.S. Capitol.

entries.title: Chevron announces $75 billion stock buyback, dividend boost
entries.description: The plan comes after a massive year for energy stocks, as a reopened U.S. economy and Russia's invasion of Ukraine combined to drive oil  prices hire in 2022

entries.title: GDP report could show solid fourth-quarter growth but still signal a recession is coming, economists say
entries.description: Economic growth is expected to have slowed slightly in the fourth quarter, but was still solid, driven by a strong consumer.

entries.title: Tesla reports record revenue and beats on earnings
entries.description: Electric vehicle maker Tesla reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

entries.title: IBM exceeds revenue estimates, though sales are about the same as a year earlier
entries.description: Growth in mainframe sales helped IBM avoid slipping back into a pattern of declining revenue. The company faces a high bar for free cash flow in 2023 and 2024.

entries.title: Precision Neuroscience, co-founded by Neuralink alum, is creating a brain implant thinner than a human hair
entries.description: Precision Neuroscience announced a $41 million Series B funding round Wednesday, bringing its total to $53 million in under two years.

entries.title: DCG-owned crypto exchange Luno axes 35% of staff, citing market turbulence
entries.description: London-based crypto exchange Luno informed employees Wednesday of the redundancies at 12 p.m. GMT in a live-streamed town hall.

entries.title: Omicron booster shots provide some protection against mild illness from Covid XBB subvariants, CDC says
U.S. will send Abrams tanks to Ukraine ahead of expected Russian offensive
entries.description: The 31 M1A1 Abrams sent by the Biden administration are not expected to arrive in Ukraine for several months.

entries.title: More detail on what exactly caused NYSE's trading glitch on Tuesday
entries.description: The root cause of the Big Board's trading glitch at the Tuesday open was due to a manual error involving the Exchange's Disaster Recovery configuration.

entries.title: Russia fumes at West's decision to send tanks to Ukraine, says red lines have been crossed
entries.description: Russia has expressed mounting fury at the prospect of modern, Western tanks being sent to Ukraine.

entries.title: Harvard neuroscientist: The 'most underrated' skill all successful people have—'especially introverts'
entries.description: Even if you're an introvert, there are ways to build confidence — whether it's with making small talk, giving presentations or sending emails. Harvard neuroscientist Juliette Han shares the "most underrated" skill that successful communicators have.

entries.title: Fed's Lael Brainard among leading contenders for top White House economic post
entries.description: The central bank official is considered a strong candidate to succeed Brian Deece as director of the National Economic Council, the Washington Post reported.

entries.title: Boeing posts quarterly loss as labor and supply strains overshadow increase in jet demand
entries.description: Boeing's orders and deliveries rose last year as travel rebounded.

entries.title: Microsoft users hit with global cloud outage that impacted products like Teams and Outlook
entries.description: Microsoft is investigating issues with several of its products including Teams and Outlook, the company said Tuesday.

entries.title: German recession 'very unlikely' given brighter business sentiment, Ifo head says
entries.description: Ifo President Clemens Fuest told CNBC that lower energy prices and the end of gas rationing fears were key drivers of optimism.

entries.title: Russia says it carried out hypersonic missile exercises using a frigate in the Atlantic
entries.description: The Russian Defense Ministry said one of its frigates had conducted "hypersonic missile exercises" in the western part of the Atlantic Ocean.

entries.title: Germany U-turns over battle tanks, saying it will send Leopard 2s to Ukraine
entries.description: Germany announced it is ready to send 14 its own tanks to Ukraine and to allow others to do so, in an U-turn from its previous position.

entries.title: Semiconductor giant ASML sees 2023 sales surge; says China revenue to be steady despite U.S. chip restrictions
entries.description: Dutch chip equipment maker ASML forecast a 25% jump in 2023 revenue as the semiconductor industry forecasts a recovery in the second half of this year.

entries.title: Amazon workers stage first-ever strike in the UK over pay, working conditions
entries.description: Amazon workers staged their first-ever strike in the U.K. Wednesday at the tech giant's warehouse in Coventry, central England.

entries.title: Morgan Stanley reveals its 8 favorite stocks ahead of Europe's earnings season
entries.description: The investment bank has identified eight stocks to buy ahead of a potentially volatile European earnings season.

entries.title: Adani shares fall as short seller firm Hindenburg announces short position
entries.description: Short seller firm Hindenburg announced its short position in Adani Group companies ahead of India's market open on Wednesday.

entries.title: F1 sends incendiary letter to FIA after Mohammed Ben Sulayem's 'inflated price tags of $20bn' claim
entries.description: The letter, which has been seen by Sky News, threatens to escalate tensions between Formula 1 and the FIA.

entries.title: Microsoft's forecast suggests gloomy tech environment will continue
entries.description: Microsoft's business weakened in December. Now it expects those patterns to continue to play out through March, including in its critical Azure cloud.

entries.title: Google job cuts hit 1,800 employees in California, including 27 massage therapists
entries.description: As part of Google's largest ever round of job cuts, the company eliminated more than 1,800 positions in its home state.

entries.title: Australian inflation hits a post-1990 peak
entries.description: Inflation in Australia rose to a new 32-year high of 7.8% in the final quarter of the fiscal year of 2022, marking the fastest pace since March 1990.

entries.title: 'Outright negative' on stocks: JPMorgan's Marko Kolanovic braces for correction, hard landing
entries.description: JPMorgan's Marko Kolanovic warns 2023's market rally will collapse. The Institutional Investor top-rated strategist cut his exposure to underweight this month.

entries.title: BlockFi secret financials show a $1.2 billion relationship with Sam Bankman-Fried's crypto empire
entries.description: Financial documents that were mistakenly uploaded from bankrupt crypto firm BlockFi show a $1.2 billion relationship with FTX and Alameda Research.

entries.title: Tesla plans to spend $3.6 billion more on battery and truck manufacturing in Nevada
entries.description: Tesla said in a statement that its expanding facilities in Nevada will include a 100 GWh battery cell factory and high-volume factory to manufacture the Semi.
